host.description: The hostname or IP address of the FTP server. Defaults to localhost.

port.description: The port number of the FTP server. Defaults to 21.

user.description: The username to use for authentication.

password.description: The password to use for authentication.

secure.description: If true, use explicit FTPS (AUTH TLS). If set to 'implicit', use implicit FTPS.

secureOptions.description: Optional TLS options passed through to the underlying tls.connect.
